mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_age, member_gender, member_email, member_phone_number, member_nickname) values(#{memberId},#{memberPassword},#{memberName},#{memberAge},#{memberGender},#{memberEmail},#{memberPhoneNumber},#{memberNickname});
mapper.select: select member_number from tbl_member where member_id =#{memberId} and member_password =#{memberPassword}
select member_id, member_email from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_id = #{memberId}
